snippet.title: World's End Chapter 1 Trailer
snippet.description:
Play World's End Chapter 1 ⚔
Newgrounds: http://newgrounds.com/portal/view/621584
Kongregate: http://kongregate.com/games/MezzanineStairs/worlds-end-chapter-1
Armor Games: http://armorgames.com/play/15484/worlds-end-chapter-1

World's End is a turn-based strategy game in the genre of Final Fantasy Tactics and XCOM (TRPG/SRPG) featuring dynamic terrain with traps, shoving and obstacles including the bodies of fallen friends and foes.

Walkthrough
http://mezzaninestairs.net/r/ch1walkthrough

Mezzanine Stairs
Web Site: http://mezzaninestairs.net
Patreon: https://patreon.com/MezzanineStairs
Twitter: https://twitter.com/MezzanineStairs
Facebook: https://facebook.com/MezzanineStairs
SoundCloud: https://soundcloud.com/mezzaninestairs
